Package provided.discovery.impl.model

Class DiscoveryConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • provided.discovery.impl.model.DiscoveryConnector
  • public class DiscoveryConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    Optional utility class to create a connection to the discovery server. Instances of this class must be inside of the main model because it requires an IRMIUtils instance that has already been started. Note that multiple instances of an application running on the same machine should instantiate this class with different discoveryNames and different boundNames.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Constructor for the class.

      Connect to the remote discovery service using the given category, registering the local endpoint when watchOnly=False This is the method that IDiscoveryPanelAdapter's connectToDiscoveryServer() method wants to call.
      void disconnect()
      Disconnects the current internal IDiscoveryServer object, if it exists.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DiscoveryConnector

        public DiscoveryConnector​(IRMIUtils rmiUtils,
                          java.lang.String discoveryName,
                          java.lang.String boundName)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Constructor for the class. CLASS MUST BE INSTANTIATED *AFTER* RMIUtils HAS BEEN STARTED!
        Parameters:
        rmiUtils - The IRMIUtils object, already started.
        discoveryName - The name to be viewed as in the discovery server by others.
        boundName - The name to which the RMI stub will be bound to in the local Registry
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - When there is a problem connecting to the remote discovery service

    • Method Detail

      • connectToDiscoveryServer

        public void connectToDiscoveryServer​(java.lang.String category,
                                     boolean watchOnly,
                                     java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Iterable<IEndPointData>> updateFn)
                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Connect to the remote discovery service using the given category, registering the local endpoint when watchOnly=False This is the method that IDiscoveryPanelAdapter's connectToDiscoveryServer() method wants to call.
        Parameters:
        category - The category on the remote discovery service to monitor
        watchOnly - If True, only connect to the remote discovery service and watch it, otherwise also register the local endpoint when connecting.
        updateFn - A Consumer of an iterable of endpoints used, for instance, by the DiscoveryPanel to update the list of active endpoints in the category.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - When a problem occurs connect to or registering with the remote discovery service

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnects the current internal IDiscoveryServer object, if it exists.
